com.multicast
Class MulticastLayer

java.lang.Object
  com.multicast.MulticastLayer

public class MulticastLayer
extends java.lang.Object

This class is the reliable multicast layer which broadcasts and receives messages. The responsibility of this layer is to shield upper layer from retries.

Author:
parth

Field Detail

DEBUG

public boolean DEBUG
Constructor Detail

MulticastLayer

In order to get an multicast layer object, the context of android 
 application should be given for manipulating the database used for
 reliable multicast.





Parameters:
context - Android application context
bool - Debug flag











Method Detail







sendAll


public void sendAll(java.lang.String Message)




public method to send a "Message" to all the devices that are to be 
 addressed by the same receive message by them implementing an onReceive 
 method. This is a blocking call and will take a considerable amount of time to complete. 
 Time could vary according to the timeout and the retries used.





Parameters:
Message - The Gson message to be sent










addEventListener


public void addEventListener(MulticastReceive listener)




Add listener to the multicast layer event. This method is called by
 service discovery layer to add listener to the lower level event.





Parameters:
listener - Listener object










removeEventListener


public void removeEventListener(MulticastReceive listener)




Remove listener which listens on the multicast layer event.





Parameters:
listener - Listen object
